description: MCM Mathematical Modeling Competition - Paper Writing
requiredSkills: QMD formatting and mathematical notation support

userStories.title: Write Introduction section
userStories.description: Create a compelling introduction that frames the problem and motivates the approach
acceptanceCriteria: Read problem_statement.md to understand the problem
Read all references in intro contextMap
Include problem overview, motivation, and approach preview
Use QMD formatting for any mathematical notation

userStories.title: Write Literature Review section
userStories.description: Comprehensive literature review of relevant work
acceptanceCriteria: Read all literature references and the literature_guide.md
Summarize key papers and their relevance
Highlight gaps that your work addresses

userStories.title: Write Methodology section
userStories.description: Explain the mathematical models and implementation approach
acceptanceCriteria: Read the model.py and algorithms.py source code
Explain mathematical models with clear notation
Include key equations (use QMD math formatting)
Describe algorithm pseudocode or implementation details
Use qmd-writing skill to properly format equations and code

userStories.title: Write Results and Analysis section
userStories.description: Present experimental results with clear analysis
acceptanceCriteria: Read results_guide.md and results_usage.md to understand which results apply where
- Read the experiment code and output files
Insert experiment visualizations using qmd-rendering skill
Discuss what results mean for the problem
Include at least 3-4 figures and 2-3 tables

userStories.title: Write Discussion section
acceptanceCriteria: Discuss how results answer the problem

userStories.title: Write Conclusion section
acceptanceCriteria: Ensure it mirrors the introduction's scope

userStories.title: Format and finalize paper
userStories.description: Final formatting, QMD compilation, and quality check
acceptanceCriteria: Use qmd-rendering skill to compile the full document
Check all figures and tables render correctly
Verify all citations are properly formatted
